question: Sanjita Chanu has clinched India's second gold at which weightlifting category in the 21st Commonwealth Games (CWG-2018)?
explanation: Weightlifter Sanjita Chanu from Manipur has clinched the India\'s second gold at the 21st Commonwealth Games (CWG-2018) in the women\'s 53 kg weightlifting category in Gold Coast, Australia on April 6. She lifted a total of 192kg (84 kg in Snatch + 108 kg in Clean and Jerk).Beside her, Deepak Lather became the youngest Indian weightlifter to claim a Commonwealth Games medal by clinching a bronze in the men’s 69 kg category. With this, India has won 2 Gold, a silver and a gold. India is placed at third place in the Medal\'s tally now. Earlier, on April 5, P Gururaja bagged India\'s first (silver) medal in the men’s 56 kg weightlifting category and Saikhom Mirabai Chanu clinched the first gold for India in the women\'s 48 kg weightlifting category.
